Oleoresin is a mixture of volatile and nonvolatile components. It is a concentrated form of wholesome products and marketed as spice drops due to its total pungency and flavor constituents. The oleoresins can be extracted by solvent extraction of ground spice material with organic solvents such as methanol, ethanol, acetone, ethyl acetate, etc., followed by complete removal of solutions to obtain the oleoresins.
